jobDescriptions.title: Frontend Developer
jobDescriptions.description: We are seeking a seasoned Frontend Developer with a strong grasp of React and TypeScript. The ideal candidate will have experience in building responsive web applications and working with modern JavaScript frameworks.

jobDescriptions.title: Senior Frontend Developer
